articles.description: The much-anticipated immersive performance called ABBA Voyage is billed as "a concert 40 years in the making."
articles.content:
Swedish music band ABBA, shown here as wax figures, have sold over 400 million records worldwide.
Pop legends ABBA are taking a big punt on their latest immersive project, founding member Bjorn Ulva… [+4148 chars]

articles.author: Mark Mcgreal
articles.title: Chip 'n Dale: Rescue Rangers movie criticized for Peter Pan's story arc - Daily Mail
articles.description: Fans are up in arms against the portrayal of Peter Pan in the new Chip 'n Dale: Rescue Rangers movie. After Peter Pan is revealed to be the film's main villain, he explains why he became evil.
articles.content:
Fans are up in arms about the portrayal of Peter Pan in the new Chip 'n Dale: Rescue Rangers movie which came out on Disney+ Friday.

articles.author: Caspar Salmon
articles.title: In Cannes' 'Holy Spider,' a Serial Killer Murders Prostitutes in Iran — and the Country Supports Him - The Daily Beast
articles.description: The latest from filmmaker Ali Abbasi, premiering in Cannes, sees a journalist track down a man killing prostitutes in Iran. It’s guilty of the very misogyny it’s criticizing.
articles.content: A serial killer roams the streets at night, picking off desperate prostituted women, many of whom are hooked on crack, and strangles them to death in his home. A young female journalist, who is (natu… [+5313 chars]
